title: Spacious 4bd/2ba Unit in GREAT Uptown Location! 1 MONTH FREE!
posting_body: ['Spacious 4bd/2ba Unit in GREAT Uptown Location!', '1 MONTH FREE!', 'Avail.', 'NOW!', 'Property Address', '3108 Colfax Ave. S | Minneapolis, MN 55408', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'Perkins Levin Property Management |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'We are currently running a leasing special of 1 MONTH FREE for a 12 month lease or 2 MONTHS FREE for a 22-23 month lease.', 'This is a totally renovated and re-built property in the heart of Uptown!', "Aside from its location which is just blocks from bars, restaurants and shopping, some of the property's features you will enjoy include:", '-Spacious Bedrooms and closets', '-2 UPDATED bathrooms', '-Remodeled kitchen (w/ dishwasher)', '-Nice Size living and dining room', '-Sun Room', '-Washer/Dryer in unit', '-Forced Hear & Central Air', '-2 Garage Stalls included', '-Pet friendly ($50/month Pet Rent)', '-Online rent pay & professional management', '-AND MUCH MORE!!', 'Water/trash/sewage Utility =', 'Flat $100/month.', 'Tenants are also responsible for Gas and Electric.', 'For questions or a showing contact Alex at', 'show contact info', '(text/email preferred)', 'Amenities', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry', 'Off-Street Parking', 'Sun room', 'Professional Management', 'Professional Maintenance', 'Online Rent Pay', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 4BD/2.0BA', 'Square Feet: 1,850', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $2,695.00', 'Available: Now', 'Application Fee: $25.00', 'Security Deposit: $2,695.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
